title: SEC Twitter hoax sparks $2B Bitcoin transferred to exchanges in mayhem
description:
Quick Take The recent compromise of the SEC’s Twitter/X account, which falsely posted Bitcoin ETF approval news, catalyzed considerable market activity. Bitcoin’s initially surged near $48,000 before plummeting to $44,900, leading to the liquidation of short and long positions. The turbulence did not stop there. The market tumult also saw short-term holders, those who’ve held […]

The post SEC Twitter hoax sparks $2B Bitcoin transferred to exchanges in mayhem appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Australian Government Official to Question Regulator Over Its Failure to Warn Crypto Investors
description: The Australian government’s assistant treasurer, Stephen Jones, has stated his intention to query the country’s securities regulator over its failure to warn investors about the risks of investing in the now-collapsed crypto investment firm Hyperverse. Jones stated that a “bunch” of Australians had invested in the scheme whose only source of income was the money […]

title: AI and Quantum Technologies Revolutionize the Financial Industry
description: In the fast-paced world of finance, innovation is the name of the game, and two powerful forces, artificial intelligence (AI) and quantum technologies, are reshaping the landscape. The synergy of these technologies, known as AQ, is not only transforming the industry but also setting new standards for efficiency, security, and innovation. title: Walmart Explores AI and Drones to Elevate Customer Shopping Experience
description: Walmart, the largest retailer in the United States, is set to enhance its customers’ shopping experiences by harnessing the power of artificial intelligence (AI) and drones. title: Bitcoin analyst predicts price surge to $55K by halving
description: Cryptocurrency trader and analyst known as “PlanB” has made a bold prediction regarding the price of Bitcoin in a recent YouTube video. PlanB anticipates that Bitcoin will reach $55,000 by the upcoming halving event, which is expected to occur in April.  The halving, which reduces Bitcoin miners’ rewards, has historically been associated with bullish trends […]

title: Meme Moguls projected to rally, Rekt Capital bullish on Ethereum
description: Meme Moguls is projected to rally even after listing on major exchanges. The MGLS presale is ongoing as Ethereum tracks higher

title: Fidelity cuts proposed spot Bitcoin ETF fee to 0.25% amid industry fee competition
description: Fidelity discloses in a recent S-1 filing that is aims to lower the charge for its upcoming Bitcoin ETF to 0.25%. The development marks a significant decrease from the previously set fee of 0.39% announced on Dec. 29. Additionally, Fidelity…

title: Most Altcoins Depend on Bitcoin’s Stability to Thrive: Santiment
description:
According to Santiment, the market intelligence platform with on-chain and social metrics, the crypto community’s attention shifted toward Bitcoin following a false Bitcoin ETF approval announcement by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).
